body_html: @poxvoculi While the migration to contrib is still ongoing, I have removed most modifications to core. Those left are the ones may lead to substantial duplicate code if removed. I'd like to seek for your opinion on whether these changes are acceptable for core, so I will have a solid ground for the contrib part.

body: @poxvoculi While the migration to contrib is still ongoing, I have removed most modifications to core. Those left are the ones may lead to substantial duplicate code if removed. I'd like to seek for your opinion on whether these changes are acceptable for core, so I will have a solid ground for the contrib part.
